mapper.sql: case when education_level=0 then '大专' when education_level=1 then '本科' when education_level=2 then '硕士' when education_level=3 then '博士' when education_level=6 then '其他' end
case when title=4 then '其他' when title=0 then '初级' when title=1 then '中级' when title=2 then '副高级' when title=3 then '正高级' end

case when result=1 then '浏览' when result=2 then '下载' when result=3 then '检索' when result=4 then '分享' when result=5 then '收藏' when result=6 then '导出' when result=7 then '笔记' when result=8 then '跳转' when result=9 then '订阅' end
mapper.select: select topic from rs_function_page_daily where 1=1 and topic like concat('%',#{topic},'%') group by topic having topic <> ''

select
result
age
topic
as classify, sum(CASE type when 1 then numbers else 0 end) as PV, sum(CASE type when 2 then numbers else 0 end) as VV, sum(CASE type when 3 then numbers else 0 end) as UV, sum(CASE type when 4 then numbers else 0 end) as NV, sum(CASE type when 5 then numbers else 0 end) as AR from rs_function_page_daily where type < 10
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result in (${model})
group by
result
age
topic
limit ${pageNum},${pageSize}

select
result
age
topic
as classify, sum(CASE type when 1 then numbers else 0 end) as PV, sum(CASE type when 2 then numbers else 0 end) as VV, sum(CASE type when 3 then numbers else 0 end) as UV, sum(CASE type when 4 then numbers else 0 end) as NV, sum(CASE type when 5 then numbers else 0 end) as AR from rs_function_page_daily where type < 10
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result in (${model})
group by
result
age
topic

select
result
age
topic
as classify,sum(numbers) as number,date from rs_function_page_daily where type =${type}
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result in (${model})
group by
result
age
topic
,date

select
'全部' as classify,
as classify,
age as classify,
as classify,
topic as classify,
sum(CASE type when 11 then numbers else 0 end) as PV, sum(CASE type when 12 then numbers else 0 end) as VV, sum(CASE type when 13 then numbers else 0 end) as UV, sum(CASE type when 16 then numbers else 0 end) as pageAccessAvg, sum(CASE type when 15 then numbers else 0 end) as contributionNum, sum(CASE type when 14 then numbers else 0 end) as logoutNum, sum(CASE type when 17 then numbers else 0 end) as logoutNumP from rs_function_page_daily where type > 10 and type < 20
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result=#{pageName}
group by
group by age
group by
group by topic
limit ${pageNum},${pageSize}

select
'全部' as classify,
as classify,
age as classify,
as classify,
topic as classify,
sum(CASE type when 11 then numbers else 0 end) as PV, sum(CASE type when 12 then numbers else 0 end) as VV, sum(CASE type when 13 then numbers else 0 end) as UV, sum(CASE type when 16 then numbers else 0 end) as pageAccessAvg, sum(CASE type when 15 then numbers else 0 end) as contributionNum, sum(CASE type when 14 then numbers else 0 end) as logoutNum, sum(CASE type when 17 then numbers else 0 end) as logoutNumP from rs_function_page_daily where type > 10 and type < 20
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result=#{pageName}
group by
group by age
group by
group by topic

select
as classify,
age as classify,
as classify,
sum(numbers) as number,date from rs_function_page_daily where 1=1
and type=${type}
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result=#{pageName}
group by
,
age,
,
date

select
as classify,
age as classify,
as classify,
topic as classify,
sum(CASE result when 1 then numbers else 0 end) as browseNum, sum(CASE result when 2 then numbers else 0 end) as downloadNum, sum(CASE result when 3 then numbers else 0 end) as searchNum, sum(CASE result when 4 then numbers else 0 end) as shareNum, sum(CASE result when 5 then numbers else 0 end) as collectNum, sum(CASE result when 6 then numbers else 0 end) as exportNum, sum(CASE result when 7 then numbers else 0 end) as noteNum, sum(CASE result when 8 then numbers else 0 end) as breakNum, sum(CASE result when 9 then numbers else 0 end) as subscriptionNum from rs_function_page_daily where type = 20
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
group by
group by age
group by
group by topic
limit ${pageNum},${pageSize}

select sum(CASE result when 1 then numbers else 0 end) as browseNum, sum(CASE result when 2 then numbers else 0 end) as downloadNum, sum(CASE result when 3 then numbers else 0 end) as searchNum, sum(CASE result when 4 then numbers else 0 end) as shareNum, sum(CASE result when 5 then numbers else 0 end) as collectNum, sum(CASE result when 6 then numbers else 0 end) as exportNum, sum(CASE result when 7 then numbers else 0 end) as noteNum, sum(CASE result when 8 then numbers else 0 end) as breakNum, sum(CASE result when 9 then numbers else 0 end) as subscriptionNum from rs_function_page_daily where type =20
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
group by
group by age
group by
group by topic

select
age
topic
as classify,sum(numbers) as number,date from rs_function_page_daily where type =20
and date in (${days})
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result in (${result})
group by
age
topic
,date

select
result
age
topic
as classify, sum(CASE type when 3 then numbers else 0 end) as UV from rs_function_page_daily where type < 10
and
date like concat(#{item},'%')
and education_level in (${education_level})
and age in (${age})
and title in (${title})
and topic=#{topic}
and result in (${model})
group by
result
age
topic
limit ${pageNum},${pageSize}
